text: Ðis syndon þa landgemæro to hymeltune.
Þæt is of baddon æsce on þæt brade gemære of ðam brade gemære on wadlege.
Of wadleage þurh ut þone wudu, norð big þam wuda oð hit cymð to hymelbroce.
Æfter hymelbroce oð hit cymð on ennanpol, of ennapole on wynna stigele, of wynna stigele þurh efna lea oð mærgna brycge.
Of þære brycge inan þone hæge, æfter þæm hæge on þa þreo gemæru, of þam gemæran on langa læge.
Of þære lege on þa dic, of þære dic on wymingc wyllan, of þære wellan on langan æcer.
Of þæm æcere þurh þone wudu on ufa læge, andlang hreawe on lytlan broc, ondlang þæs broces on hymelbroc.
Andlang brokes, and of þam broce on þa stræte, andlang stret in hennuc.
Of hennuc andlang stræt eft on baddan æsc, & ænne hagan on portan þe þe ligeþ to þam lande þe he ær hæfde, & ealle his yldran.
